thread.title: Luis Suarez scores hat-trick as Barcelona beat Eibar
thread.title_full: Luis Suarez scores hat-trick as Barcelona beat Eibar

title: Luis Suarez scores hat-trick as Barcelona beat Eibar
text:
Date: 25-10-2015 Time: 07:10:39:pm Luis Suarez 
Barcelona avoided an upset by coming from behind to overcome an impressive Eibar side, with Luis Suarez netting a hat-trick in the 3-1 victory. 
Luis Enriqueâ€™s side fell behind early on at the Camp Nou, with Borja Baston finding the net to give his side a surprise lead. But the Liga champions responded well, with Suarez finding the net three times to turn around the scoreline. 
Despite the final outcome, however, Barcelona are still evidently missing the injured Lionel Messi and Andres Iniesta - failing to keep a clean sheet for the seventh successive Liga game. The centre-back pairing of Gerard Pique and Marc Bartra will face further scrutiny after their display, as will the discipline of Javier Mascherano - who was shown a late red card. 
The result takes Barcelona level on points with rivals Real Madrid, who saw off Celta Vigo in impressive style on Saturday. Enrique has his injury problems at present, but his programme of damage limitation seems to be working reasonably well for now. 
-
